title: Desolate Land Music Pack
description: Desolate Land is a collection of 13 dystopian music tracks designed to evoke deep emotions and set the stage for intense, atmospheric experiences.
longDescription:
Desolate Land is a collection of 13 dystopian music tracks designed to evoke deep emotions and set the stage for intense, atmospheric experiences. Perfectly suited for both games and films, this pack features loopable tracks that seamlessly integrate into your projects, with light and full versions to match varying levels of tension and drama. Each composition is infused with a sense of abandonment and sorrow, blending cinematic strings, haunting synthesizers, and subtle percussion to create a soundscape that is both dark and evocative. Desolate Land – where every note echoes the fall of a world, and every melody tells a story of loss.


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 13 x Music Track

⦿ 29 x Tracks including variations, intros and outros


The Desolate Land Music Pack is suitable for any game or film genre that features themes of desolation, post-apocalyptic settings, barren landscapes, and more.


This music pack includes these types of moods; 

⦿ Emotional Music Tracks

⦿ Depressing Music Tracks

⦿ Cinematic Music Tracks

⦿ Lonely Music Tracks

⦿ Mysterious Music Tracks

⦿ Dramatic Music Tracks

⦿ Atmospheric Music Tracks

⦿ Sad Music Tracks

⦿ Post-apocalyptic Music Tracks


Total File Size: 2.17 GB

Format: 16bit, 44 kHz - 24bit, 48kHz

Number of Samples: 42 (for each sample rate/bit depth)

Available in 16bit, 44 kHz (game) and 24bit, 48kHz (video) versions
